wikipedia_page.main: Simon Widdup (10 November 1977, Doncaster, Yorkshire, England) is an English first-class cricketer, who made eleven first-class appearances for Yorkshire County Cricket Club in 2000 and 2001, when he was a part of their County Championship winning squad.  He scored a total of 245 runs, with a career best of 44 at an average of 14.41.
